  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/conferences"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a Video Conference.

#### Permissions
The API token must include the following scopes: _Video_.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"A named unique identifier for the room. Allowed characters: `A-Za-z0-9_-`. Maximum of 100 characters.","example":"my_room"},"display_name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the video conference. Maximum of 200 characters. Defaults to the value of name.","example":"My Conference's Name"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the room. Maximum of 3000 characters.","example":"This room will be used for full company all hands meetings"},"join_from":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Conference does not accept new participants before this time. Expects RFC 3339 datetime: `2022-01-01T23:59:60Z`. Date only: `2022-01-01` will be converted to `2022-01-01T00:00:00Z`"},"join_until":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Conference stops accepting new participants at this time, but keeps running until all participants leave. Expects RFC 3339 datetime: `2022-01-01T23:59:60Z`. Date only: `2022-01-01` will be converted to `2022-01-01T00:00:00Z`"},"quality":{"type":"string","description":"The conference's resolution. Allowed values are `720p` or `1080p`. Defaults to `720p`.","example":"720p"},"layout":{"type":"string","description":"The conference's initial layout. Defaults to `grid-responsive`. See documentation for a full list of supported layouts.","example":"grid-responsive"},"size":{"type":"string","description":"The size of the video conference. Allowed values are `small`, `medium` and `large`. Defaults to `medium`. See documentation for a list of size limitations.","example":"small"},"record_on_start":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to start recording a Conference Session when one is started for this Conference"},"enable_room_previews":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether a video with a preview of the content of the conference is to be generated."},"enable_chat":{"type":"boolean","description":"Enables group chat for all participants of the room. Defaults to `true`."},"dark_primary":{"type":"string","description":"Used for CTA buttons and selected items. Defaults to `#044EF4`","example":"#044EF4"},"dark_background":{"type":"string","description":"Main background color. Defaults to `#FFFFFF`","example":"#FFFFFF"},"dark_foreground":{"type":"string","description":"Main foreground color. Defaults to `#1D2127`","example":"#1D2127"},"dark_success":{"type":"string","description":"Used for success indications. Defaults to `#17BB58`","example":"#17BB58"},"dark_negative":{"type":"string","description":" Used for error indications. Defaults to `#F42C50`","example":"#F42C50"},"light_primary":{"type":"string","description":"Used for CTA buttons and selected items. Defaults to `#044EF4`","example":"#044EF4"},"light_background":{"type":"string","description":"Main background color. Defaults to `#FFFFFF`","example":"#FFFFFF"},"light_foreground":{"type":"string","description":"Main foreground color. Defaults to `#1D2127`","example":"#1D2127"},"light_success":{"type":"string","description":"Used for success indications. Defaults to `#17BB58`","example":"#17BB58"},"light_negative":{"type":"string","description":"Used for error indications. Defaults to `#F42C50`","example":"#F42C50"}}}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"A unique identifier for the video conference"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"A named unique identifier for the room. Allowed characters: `A-Za-z0-9_-`. Maximum of 100 characters.","example":"my_room"},"display_name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the video conference. Maximum of 200 characters. Defaults to the value of name.","example":"My Conference's Name"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the room. Maximum of 3000 characters.","example":"This room will be used for full company all hands meetings"},"join_from":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Conference does not accept new participants before this time. Expects RFC 3339 datetime: `2022-01-01T23:59:60Z`. Date only: `2022-01-01` will be converted to `2022-01-01T00:00:00Z`"},"join_until":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Conference stops accepting new participants at this time, but keeps running until all participants leave. Expects RFC 3339 datetime: `2022-01-01T23:59:60Z`. Date only: `2022-01-01` will be converted to `2022-01-01T00:00:00Z`"},"quality":{"type":"string","description":"The conference's resolution. Allowed values are `720p` or `1080p`. Defaults to `720p`.","example":"720p"},"layout":{"type":"string","description":"The conference's initial layout. Defaults to `grid-responsive`. See documentation for a full list of supported layouts.","example":"grid-responsive"},"size":{"type":"string","description":"The size of the video conference. Allowed values are `small`, `medium` and `large`. Defaults to `medium`. See documentation for a list of size limitations.","example":"small"},"record_on_start":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to start recording a Conference Session when one is started for this Conference"},"enable_room_previews":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether a video with a preview of the content of the conference is to be generated."},"enable_chat":{"type":"boolean","description":"Enables group chat for all participants of the room. Defaults to `true`."},"dark_primary":{"type":"string","description":"Used for CTA buttons and selected items. Defaults to `#044EF4`","example":"#044EF4"},"dark_background":{"type":"string","description":"Main background color. Defaults to `#FFFFFF`","example":"#FFFFFF"},"dark_foreground":{"type":"string","description":"Main foreground color. Defaults to `#1D2127`","example":"#1D2127"},"dark_success":{"type":"string","description":"Used for success indications. Defaults to `#17BB58`","example":"#17BB58"},"dark_negative":{"type":"string","description":" Used for error indications. Defaults to `#F42C50`","example":"#F42C50"},"light_primary":{"type":"string","description":"Used for CTA buttons and selected items. Defaults to `#044EF4`","example":"#044EF4"},"light_background":{"type":"string","description":"Main background color. Defaults to `#FFFFFF`","example":"#FFFFFF"},"light_foreground":{"type":"string","description":"Main foreground color. Defaults to `#1D2127`","example":"#1D2127"},"light_success":{"type":"string","description":"Used for success indications. Defaults to `#17BB58`","example":"#17BB58"},"light_negative":{"type":"string","description":"Used for error indications. Defaults to `#F42C50`","example":"#F42C50"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"active_session":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique ID of the session"},"room_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique ID of the Room if the Session was created from a Room and was not an auto-created Session."},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The named identifier of room session.","example":"my_example_room"},"display_name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of room, no character limitations. Maxium of 200 characters. Defaults to the value of name.","example":"My Room's Name"},"join_from":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Room Session does not accept new Members before this time."},"join_until":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Room Session stops accepting new Members at this time."},"remove_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Remove Members from the Room Session at this time."},"remove_after_seconds_elapsed":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Remove Members after they are in the Room Session for N seconds.","example":120},"layout":{"type":"string","description":"The Room Session's initial layout. Defaults to `grid-responsive`. See documentation for a full list of supported layouts.","example":"grid-responsive"},"max_members":{"type":"integer","description":"The maximum number of members allowed in the room at a time.","example":20},"fps":{"type":"integer","example":20,"description":"The Room Session's frames per second. Possible values are `20` or `30`."},"quality":{"type":"string","description":"The Room Session's resolution. Possible values are `720p` or `1080p`.","example":"720p"},"start_time":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"end_time":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"duration":{"type":"integer","description":"How long, in seconds, the Room Session lasted.","example":120},"status":{"type":"string","example":"completed"},"record_on_start":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether a recording was automatically started when this Room Session began."},"enable_room_previews":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether a video with a preview of the content of the room is to be generated."},"preview_url":{"type":"string","description":"If room previews are enabled and the room session is in progress, this is the URL of the preview video.","example":"https://..."},"audio_video_sync":{"type":"boolean","description":"Enable/disable jitter buffer audio-video sync.","example":true,"default":false}}}}}]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
